entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rainshower, 4.8°C

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers this morning. Fog patches. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Showers. Temperature steady near plus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Showers beginning this evening. Fog patches. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Temperature steady near plus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of rain. Temperature falling to plus 1 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Fog patches dissipating early in the afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 early in the afternoon. Temperature falling to plus 1 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 31 December 2022
